RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Michael Pace [mpace1027@gmail.com]
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: replacemidiwithaudio
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: A XRNX tool to use after recording an audio sample generated from midi notes in the current track. Mutes the track and groups it with a new track containing the newly recorded audio. Preserves effects from the original track.
